name: Lonespace
description:
Welcome to LoneSpace !

Discover the universe like you have never seen it before.

You will be embodied in a small astronaut lost in space, looking forward to get back to his satellite.

To do so you will have to pass several trials more dangerous each than the previous one.

Play with gravity and mines to get the stars on your way home and unblock the next levels.

Use the rocket pack to pass the hardest challenges and rule the universe.

Features :

- first level pack ( 27 levels )

- fun and smooth design

- great sci-fi soundtrack
